refnamediv.refpurpose: run the Amanda cleanup process after a failure

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Amcleanup generates the Amanda Mail Report and updates the Amanda databases after a system failure on a tape server host. This cleanup process is normally done automatically as part of the amdump program, but if amdump cannot complete for some reason (usually because of a tape server host crash), amcleanup must be run some time later (usually during system boot).

See the
man page for more details about Amanda.

listitem.para: Kill all process listed in the log file are their child. if there is no log file, then kill all amdump and amflush process and their child.
Do the cleanup only if all process listed in the log file are already terminated.
